data.message: He's telling you to buy his album while also telling you to fuck off. You all are sheep

replies.message:
I am not a sheep.
You think you're fucking high and mighty ? You must be the only smart sheep of all of us hey? We couldn't possibly understand it but just not care because we like his music? It's personal opinion you fool. we like his music. Personal taste makes us sheep hey? Haha okay. Good on you. Keep your useless opinion to a forum that cares for it.
